tasks.label: Install and quick build
args: set -euo pipefail; cd myphoenixphone; corepack enable || true; npm ci; npm run -w apps/backend build; npm run -w apps/web build --silent || true; echo 'DONE'

tasks.label: Lint backend and web
args: set -euo pipefail; cd myphoenixphone; npm run -w apps/backend lint --silent; npm run -w apps/web lint --silent; echo 'LINT DONE'

tasks.label: Run backend tests
args: set -euo pipefail; cd myphoenixphone; npm run -w apps/backend test -- --ci --reporters=default --runInBand
